languages.text: {n}Вы декламируете воистину витиеватый и длинный список напутствий и благословений, коими {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вас осыпали с рождения{/d}, и присутствующие внимают, затаив дыхание. С каждой минутой лицо префекта вытягивается, но всю добрую четверть часа, что занимает ваша речь, она не смеет проронить и слова.{/n}

{n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы декламируете воистину витиеватый и длинный список напутствий и благословений, коими {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}вас осыпали с рождения{/d}, и присутствующие внимают, затаив дыхание. С каждой минутой лицо префекта вытягивается, но всю добрую четверть часа, что занимает ваша речь, она не смеет проронить и слова.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你说出了一连串极其冗长的祝福与鼓励致辞。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}当你出生的时候{/d}，其他人也曾对你说过这一连串冗长的致辞。你开口的时候，所有人都屏息凝神，认真倾听。你每说一分钟，行政官的脸似乎就拉长了一分。然而，在你长达十五分钟的发言之中，她一句话都不敢插嘴。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你说出了一连串极其冗长的祝福与鼓励致辞。{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}当你出生的时候{/d}，其他人也曾对你说过这一连串冗长的致辞。你开口的时候，所有人都屏息凝神，认真倾听。你每说一分钟，行政官的脸似乎就拉长了一分。然而，在你长达十五分钟的发言之中，她一句话都不敢插嘴。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}生まれて以来授けられてきた{/d}すべての祝福と激励の言葉を、記憶に残すほど長く華麗に列挙する。出席者たちは息を呑んで聞いている。時間が経つにつれて総監の顔はどんどん青ざめていくが、15分間にも及ぶあなたの演説の間、彼女は一言も口にする勇気を持てなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}生まれて以来授けられてきた{/d}すべての祝福と激励の言葉を、記憶に残すほど長く華麗に列挙する。出席者たちは息を呑んで聞いている。時間が経つにつれて総監の顔はどんどん青ざめていくが、15分間にも及ぶあなたの演説の間、彼女は一言も口にする勇気を持てなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Enuncias la lista larga, florida e impresionante de todas las bendiciones y honores que se {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}te han concedido desde tu nacimiento{/d}. Los presentes escuchan conteniendo el aliento. A cada minuto que pasa, la expresión de la prefecta se hunde más, pero no osa decir palabra durante tu discurso, que dura un buen cuarto de hora.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Enuncias la lista larga, florida e impresionante de todas las bendiciones y honores que se {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}te han concedido desde tu nacimiento{/d}. Los presentes escuchan conteniendo el aliento. A cada minuto que pasa, la expresión de la prefecta se hunde más, pero no osa decir palabra durante tu discurso, que dura un buen cuarto de hora.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du zählst eine beeindruckend lange und ausgeschmückte Liste der Segen und Zusprüche auf, mit denen du {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}seit der Geburt überhäuft wurdest{/d}. Die Anwesenden lauschen mit angehaltenem Atem. Mit jeder Minute wird das Gesicht der Präfektin länger, aber sie wagt es nicht, während deiner Ansprache auch nur ein Wort zu äußern – und diese dauert immerhin fast eine Viertelstunde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du zählst eine beeindruckend lange und ausgeschmückte Liste der Segen und Zusprüche auf, mit denen du {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}seit der Geburt überhäuft wurdest{/d}. Die Anwesenden lauschen mit angehaltenem Atem. Mit jeder Minute wird das Gesicht der Präfektin länger, aber sie wagt es nicht, während deiner Ansprache auch nur ein Wort zu äußern – und diese dauert immerhin fast eine Viertelstunde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Doğduğun günden beri üzerine yağdırılan{/d} tüm kutsamaları ve övgüleri uzun ve süslü cümlelerle tek tek dile getiriyorsun. Salondakiler, nefeslerini tutmuş dinliyor. Prefektin yüzü gitgide düşüyor ama konuşman boyunca tek kelime etmeye cesaret edemiyor. Konuşman neredeyse on beş dakika sürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}Doğduğun günden beri üzerine yağdırılan{/d} tüm kutsamalar ve övgüleri uzun ve süslü cümlelerle tek tek dile getiriyorsun. Salondakiler nefeslerini tutmuş dinliyorlar. Dakikalar geçtikçe, prefektin yüzü gitgide düşüyor ama konuşman boyunca tek kelime etmeye cesaret edemiyor. Konuşman neredeyse on beş dakika sürüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous prononcez une longue liste alambiquée de tous les salutations et encouragements que vous avez reçus {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}depuis votre naissance{/d}. Votre audience est pendue à vos lèvres. Plus les minutes passent, plus la préfète a l'air déconfite. Toutefois, elle n'ose pas interrompre votre monologue, qui dure un bon quart d'heure.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You enunciate an impressively long and ornate list of all the blessings and encouragements that have been {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Nobility}showered upon you since birth{/d}. Those in attendance listen with bated breath. With each passing minute, the prefect's face falls lower and lower, but she dares not utter a word throughout your speech, which takes a good quarter of an hour.{/n}
